mapper.insert: insert member (id, name, oid, role, createdTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{oid},#{role},now())
mapper.select: select id, name, oid,role from member where id = #{id}
select member.id, member.name, member.role,org.name from org, member where member.oid=org.id and org.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update org set name = #{name} where id = #{id}
update org set role = #{role} where id = #{id}
